description:
FixedPointMathLib.rpow(uint256,uint256,uint256) (contracts/libraries/FixedPointMathLib.sol#74-160) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-x = xxRound_rpow_asm_0 / scalar (contracts/libraries/FixedPointMathLib.sol#131)
	-zx_rpow_asm_0 = z * x (contracts/libraries/FixedPointMathLib.sol#136)
markdown:
[FixedPointMathLib.rpow(uint256,uint256,uint256)](contracts/libraries/FixedPointMathLib.sol#L74-L160) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[x = xxRound_rpow_asm_0 / scalar](contracts/libraries/FixedPointMathLib.sol#L131)
	-[zx_rpow_asm_0 = z * x](contracts/libraries/FixedPointMathLib.sol#L136)

description:
Reentrancy in ozPayMe.sendToArb(StorageBeacon.VariableConfig,StorageBeacon.UserConfig) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#68-120):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(fee,fxConfig.ETH) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#81)
		- (success) = fxConfig.gelato.call{value: _amount}() (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#188)
	- (success,returnData) = fxConfig.inbox.call{value: address(this).balance}(ticketData) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#103)
	- (success,returnData) = fxConfig.inbox.call{value: address(this).balance}(ticketData) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#105)
	- _runEmergencyMode() (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#107)
		- success = token_.transfer(user_,amount_) (contracts/libraries/ozERC20Lib.sol#30)
		- StorageBeacon(storage_).setFailedERCFunds(user_,token_,amount_) (contracts/libraries/ozERC20Lib.sol#40)
		- success = token_.approve(spender_,amount_) (contracts/libraries/ozERC20Lib.sol#20)
		- IWETH(eMode.tokenIn).deposit{value: address(this).balance}() (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#141)
		- success = IERC20(eMode.tokenIn).ozApprove(address(eMode.swapRouter),userDetails.user,balanceWETH,sBeacon) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#144-146)
		- eMode.swapRouter.exactInputSingle(params) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#162-180)
		- IERC20(eMode.tokenIn).ozTransfer(userDetails.user,balanceWETH,sBeacon) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#169)
		- IERC20(eMode.tokenIn).ozTransfer(userDetails.user,balanceWETH,sBeacon) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#177)
	- Emitter(fxConfig.emitter).forwardEvent(ticketID) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#116)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _transfer(fee,fxConfig.ETH) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#81)
		- (success) = fxConfig.gelato.call{value: _amount}() (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#188)
	- (success,returnData) = fxConfig.inbox.call{value: address(this).balance}(ticketData) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#103)
	- (success,returnData) = fxConfig.inbox.call{value: address(this).balance}(ticketData) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#105)
	- _runEmergencyMode() (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#107)
		- IWETH(eMode.tokenIn).deposit{value: address(this).balance}() (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#141)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- FundsToArb(userDetails_.user,amountToSend) (contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#118)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [ozPayMe.sendToArb(StorageBeacon.VariableConfig,StorageBeacon.UserConfig)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L68-L120):
	External calls:
	- [_transfer(fee,fxConfig.ETH)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L81)
		- [(success) = fxConfig.gelato.call{value: _amount}()](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L188)
	- [(success,returnData) = fxConfig.inbox.call{value: address(this).balance}(ticketData)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L103)
	- [(success,returnData) = fxConfig.inbox.call{value: address(this).balance}(ticketData)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L105)
	- [_runEmergencyMode()](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L107)
		- [success = token_.transfer(user_,amount_)](contracts/libraries/ozERC20Lib.sol#L30)
		- [StorageBeacon(storage_).setFailedERCFunds(user_,token_,amount_)](contracts/libraries/ozERC20Lib.sol#L40)
		- [success = token_.approve(spender_,amount_)](contracts/libraries/ozERC20Lib.sol#L20)
		- [IWETH(eMode.tokenIn).deposit{value: address(this).balance}()](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L141)
		- [success = IERC20(eMode.tokenIn).ozApprove(address(eMode.swapRouter),userDetails.user,balanceWETH,sBeacon)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L144-L146)
		- [eMode.swapRouter.exactInputSingle(params)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L162-L180)
		- [IERC20(eMode.tokenIn).ozTransfer(userDetails.user,balanceWETH,sBeacon)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L169)
		- [IERC20(eMode.tokenIn).ozTransfer(userDetails.user,balanceWETH,sBeacon)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L177)
	- [Emitter(fxConfig.emitter).forwardEvent(ticketID)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L116)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [_transfer(fee,fxConfig.ETH)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L81)
		- [(success) = fxConfig.gelato.call{value: _amount}()](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L188)
	- [(success,returnData) = fxConfig.inbox.call{value: address(this).balance}(ticketData)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L103)
	- [(success,returnData) = fxConfig.inbox.call{value: address(this).balance}(ticketData)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L105)
	- [_runEmergencyMode()](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L107)
		- [IWETH(eMode.tokenIn).deposit{value: address(this).balance}()](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L141)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [FundsToArb(userDetails_.user,amountToSend)](contracts/ethereum/ozPayMe.sol#L118)
